title: It vs What
description: It или What? Разбираемся в расщеплённых предложениях (cleft sentences).

tasks.question: ___ was John who first suggested the idea at the meeting.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + noun/pronoun + who/that. Выделяем «кто» — It was John who...

tasks.question: ___ really matters is your willingness to learn from mistakes.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What + clause + is/was. What = «то, что» / «что именно». What really matters is...

tasks.question: ___ is the lack of transparency that concerns me the most.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It is + noun phrase + that. Выделяем «что именно» беспокоит — It is the lack of transparency that...

tasks.question: ___ I need right now is a strong cup of coffee.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What I need is... = «То, что мне нужно — это...». What заменяет «the thing that».

tasks.question: ___ was in 2019 that the company opened its first overseas office.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + time expression + that. Выделяем «когда» — It was in 2019 that...

tasks.question: ___ surprised everyone was the speed of his recovery after surgery.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What surprised everyone was... = «То, что всех удивило — это...». What = the thing that.

tasks.question: ___ was the marketing team that identified the gap in the market.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + noun + that. Выделяем «кто именно» — It was the marketing team that...

tasks.question: ___ the report revealed was a pattern of systematic negligence.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What the report revealed was... = «То, что показал отчёт — это...». What = the thing that.

tasks.question: ___ was her dedication, not her talent, that led to her success.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + noun + that. Выделяем «что именно» привело к успеху — преданность, а не талант.

tasks.question: ___ we need to discuss is the timeline for implementation.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What we need to discuss is... = «То, что нам нужно обсудить — это...».

tasks.question: ___ was precisely this issue that the auditors flagged in their report.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + noun phrase + that. Выделяем «именно этот вопрос» отметили аудиторы.

tasks.question: ___ impressed me most was their attention to the smallest details.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What impressed me most was... = «Больше всего меня впечатлило то, что...».

tasks.question: ___ is the rising cost of raw materials that threatens our profit margins.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It is + noun phrase + that. Выделяем «что именно» угрожает — рост цен на сырьё.

tasks.question: ___ happened next took everyone in the room by complete surprise.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What happened next... = «То, что произошло дальше...». What заменяет «the thing that».

tasks.question: ___ was during the negotiations that the fundamental disagreement emerged.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + time/place + that. Выделяем «когда» — во время переговоров.

tasks.question: ___ concerns the board is the potential for regulatory penalties.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What concerns the board is... = «То, что беспокоит совет директоров — это...».

tasks.question: ___ wasn't the budget that caused the delay but poor project management.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft с отрицанием: It wasn't X that... but Y. «Не бюджет вызвал задержку, а плохое управление.»

tasks.question: ___ the data suggests is a strong correlation between the two variables.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What the data suggests is... = «То, на что указывают данные — это...».

tasks.question: ___ was only after the merger that the full financial picture became clear.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was only after + event + that. «Только после слияния стала ясна полная картина.»

tasks.question: ___ you should focus on is building stronger client relationships.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What you should focus on is... = «То, на чём тебе стоит сосредоточиться — это...».

tasks.question: ___ was the government's inaction that drew widespread criticism from the media.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + noun + that. Выделяем «бездействие правительства» как объект критики.

tasks.question: ___ makes this approach unique is its emphasis on sustainable development.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What makes this approach unique is... = «Что делает этот подход уникальным — это...».

tasks.question: ___ is not the technology itself but how we use ___ that determines the outcome.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It is not X but Y that... «Не сама технология, а то, как мы её используем, определяет результат.»

tasks.question: ___ the investigation uncovered was far more disturbing than anyone anticipated.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What the investigation uncovered was... = «То, что обнаружило расследование, было...».

tasks.question: ___ was at the annual conference that they first announced the breakthrough.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + place + that. Выделяем место — «именно на ежегодной конференции».

tasks.question: ___ worries me is the lack of a contingency plan for emergencies.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What worries me is... = «Что меня беспокоит — это отсутствие плана на случай ЧС.»

tasks.question: ___ was the CEO herself who personally approved the controversial decision.
tasks.explanation: It-cleft: It was + person + who. «Именно CEO лично одобрила спорное решение.»

tasks.question: ___ we learned from the failure proved invaluable for future projects.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What we learned from... = «То, что мы извлекли из провала, оказалось бесценным.»

tasks.question: ___ is often said that the best leaders listen more than they speak.
tasks.explanation: It is said that — безличная конструкция: «Говорят, что...». Формальный стиль, не cleft, но It + passive.

tasks.question: ___ distinguishes great leaders from good ones is emotional intelligence.
tasks.explanation: What-cleft: What distinguishes... is... = «То, что отличает великих лидеров — это эмоциональный интеллект.»
